title: Did Riot remove First Win of the Day?
body: I play my games, win, but have not received a First Win of the Day bonus for the previous two days. Has there been any changes to its requirements or anything? Its also not showing up in client. This game is really tough to play (there have been so many negative changes to this game its unbearable) so I take week-long breaks and miss out on patches. Just wondering if somewhere its been removed?

replies.body:
@ everyone, the OP is only level 14.

with runes reforged you only earn FWOTD at level 15+

its not a bug, he just hasn't unlocked it yet.
Yup thats correct. The bug is in the yellow "1" indicating I have a new mission available but nothing showed up. Also, I'm level 15 TYVM :). Are you saying it unlocks at lvl 16?
Yup thats correct. The bug is in the yellow "1" indicating I have a new mission available but nothing showed up.
I got mine yesterday, time for a bug report?
if it's not showing then I would go to the bugs section of the boards and post the thread there since something might be up with your account and they could help out more

Yeah, filled in the bug report section. Im having the same issue a lot of other players are having where I cannot even log into support to send a ticket. I was just hoping this was a bug that others were having but it appears that is not the case.

even if more people were having this bug, due to how the gameplay section is the chances of someone with the bug actually finding the thread before it gets drowned out by the constant wave of threads or replies is very minimal. At least in the bug section even if a rioter doesn't get to it first someone else that has had the issue before could come in and help out way easier since not that many threads are made there in comparison to the gameplay section
Pretty sure I got my first win of the day yesterday, maybe you just missed it?

No, like its not showing up anywhere on my client. Even in my match history all my wins are around 180-240XP per win. If you do a player search and look at my match history you can see the exact XP gains for all my games.

Not sure they show the gains you get from missions in it

check your Missions tab in the bottom right - it looks like a piece of paper flapping blissfully in the wind
Yes, its completely empty. Does not even list any completed missions. I took an 11 day break from the game was wondering if there was a change to the loot system or something in between patches?
